title: After $17.5 Billion Bet, Microsoft Says India Moving From AI Experiments to Real-World Impact
description: Unmetered intelligence, human-supervised digital colleagues, and continuous skilling as the key safeguard amid big shifts will shape an artificial intelligence, or AI-rewired, future.

title: SoundHound AI (NASDAQ:SOUN) Stock Price Up 1.2% on Analyst Upgrade
description: SoundHound AI, Inc. (NASDAQ:SOUN – Get Free Report) shares were up 1.2% during trading on Friday after LADENBURG THALM/SH SH upgraded the stock to a strong-buy rating. The company traded as high as $11.16 and last traded at $11.02. Approximately 23,982,847 shares changed hands during mid-day trading, a decline of 45% from the average daily [...]

title: Delhi airport scuffle: AI Express pilot denies allegations; alleges casteist abuse, threats to family
description: The #AirIndiaExpress pilot, accused of assaulting a passenger at #DelhiAirport, has denied the allegations and claimed he was subjected to verbal abuse, casteist remarks and threats against his family.

title: Can Trump’s daring decision to permit Nvidia’s AI chip sales to China achieve success?
description: On this week's episode of Everybody's Business, Nilay Patel from The Verge joins Max Chafkin and Stacey Vanek to discuss current business trends and insights.This article was originally published here: Can Trump’s daring decision to permit Nvidia’s AI chip sales to China achieve success?
